titleStmt.title: The first fruites of the Gentiles In three sermons preached in the cathedrall church at Sarum. By Bartholomevv Parsons Batchelor in Divinitie, and vicar of Collingborne-Kingstone, in the county of Wiltes.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Bartholomew, 1574-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for I. H[arrison] and Edw. Blackmore, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Blazing Starre,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The first fruits of the Gentiles.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Blazing Starre
